data.name: Ford Racing 3
data.detailed_description:
Ford is without doubt one of the biggest brands in the world, with one of the most famous product ranges ever. Ford Racing 3 takes this amazing range of vehicles, from the
Model T Ford through to the latest concepts, and pits them against a huge variety of courses, cars and challenges.

Features:

• Compete in Ford vehicles past, present and future. Race 46 beautifully modeled vehicles from the Ford line-up, including a ’49 Ford, the F150 and the latest 2005 Mustang GT!

• 26 detailed and diverse environments with animated and interactive scenery including road tracks, off-road and raceways.

• A wide range of car themes – including concept, movie star, living legends, low rider and space age.

• New modes to augment your Ford experiences, including relay, overtake, boost and a host of updated game modes.

• A vast array of extras and unlockables including the latest Ford movies and pictures. A must-see for all Ford fans!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XP
  • Processor: 800 MHz Pentium III
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 32 MB DirectX9 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: No sound card is required for minimum specification
